meanings.definition: The act of not purchasing something.
meanings.sent1: Her nonbuying of the expensive dress saved her money.
meanings.sent2: The nonbuying of the new phone surprised the salesperson.
meanings.sent3: His nonbuying of the tempting chocolates was a test of willpower.
meanings.sent4: The nonbuying of happiness with material possessions is a valuable lesson.
meanings.sent5: The nonbuying of unnecessary items led to a clutter-free home.

meanings.definition: The state of abstaining from buying.
meanings.sent1: After declaring bankruptcy, he entered a period of nonbuying.
meanings.sent2: The minimalist lifestyle promotes a mindset of nonbuying.
meanings.sent3: Her nonbuying streak was impressive to her frugal friends.
meanings.sent4: In a world of consumerism, nonbuying can be a rebellious act.
meanings.sent5: The nonbuying philosophy focuses on mindful consumption.

meanings.sent1: His nonbuying of the inferior product was a smart choice.
meanings.sent2: The company's nonbuying of unethical materials was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The nonbuying protest gained attention from the media.
meanings.sent4: Nonbuying can be a powerful tool for advocating change.
meanings.sent5: Her nonbuying stance was a stand against exploitation.
